      • getDownstream

        public static java.util.ArrayList<com.ibm.json.java.JSONObject> getDownstream(com.ibm.json.java.JSONObject visitOp,
                                                              com.ibm.json.java.JSONObject graph)
        Get all operators immediately downstream of the visitOp operator. No exceptions are made for marker operators.

        Specifically, searches the graph, and returns a list of operators which have an input port connected to any output port of visitOp.
        Parameters:
        visitOp - The operator for which all immediate downstream operators should be returned.
        graph - The graph JSONObject in which visitOp resides.
        Returns:
        A list of all operators immediately downstream from visitOp

      • getUpstream

        public static java.util.List<com.ibm.json.java.JSONObject> getUpstream(com.ibm.json.java.JSONObject visitOp,
                                                       com.ibm.json.java.JSONObject graph)
        Get all operators immediately upstream of the visitOp operator. No exceptions are made for marker operators.

        Specifically, searches the graph, and returns a list of operators which have an output port connected to any input port of visitOp.
        Parameters:
        visitOp - The operator for which all immediate upstream operators should be returned.
        graph - The graph JSONObject in which visitOp resides.
        Returns:
        A list of all operators immediately upstream from visitOp
